thread.title: Last Man Standing Co-op 4.0 Release Soon! + LMS Standalone?

post.author: calimer
post.body:
The moment everyone has been waiting for is finally upon us! We are in the final stretch for releasing the multiple award winning Coop Doom 3 Mod Last Man Standing Co-op 4.0! We are estimating that 4.0 will be released in the next 1-2 weeks!! Currently we are working on incorporating the optimized Classic Doom for Doom 3 1.3.1 maps into LMS. For more information on that mod check out http://Cdoom.d3files.com LMS 4.0 will also include numerous map fixes/tweaks especially to the SP Coop levels. Heruncle has put a lot of work into preventing players from telefragging and many other fixes that make the levels much more fun to play. In addition there is a new map from Alucard called TS_Hellpentagram to give us now over 80 maps tweaked for Co-op play! If you are interested in helping to test 4.0 as we put together this final release of LMS please contact us either in the forums or IRC.

There has been a lot of discussion as to what the next project will be for the LMS community. One of the ideas that has been greatly discussed is the idea for a Standalone version of LMS. If this were to happen Platinum Arts Sandbox is what would be used to create it. As a note Sandbox Beta Beta 2.1 has already received over 3k downloads on fileplanet in less than two weeks. You can find more information about Sandbox here:
http://Kids.PlatinumArts.Net

We are interested in your opinions on the matter and also seeing who would be interested in helping out. Please check out the forum post here and let us know what you think:
http://lms.d3files.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=18617

Take care and thanks for your interest in Last Man Standing Co-op!
-calimer
